mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point(p_id, m_id, p_date, p_changepoint, p_currentpoint, p_detail, p_editor, p_editdate) VALUES( (LPAD(POINT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 10,'0')), #{m_id}, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{p_changepoint}, #{p_currentpoint} + #{p_changepoint}, #{p_detail}, #{m_id}, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )
mapper.select: SELECT p_currentpoint FROM ( SELECT p_currentpoint, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY p_id DESC) ROWNUMBER FROM point WHERE m_id like #{m_id}) WHERE ROWNUMBER = 1
